overview: She tells her husband she's at the gym or out with her girlfriends, but she's really sneaking off to a secret rendezvous with some young, hard cock! 5 horny, married women with sexual urges are not going to let a little thing like a wedding ring hold them back!
tagline: My husband has left me all alone. What are you going to do about it?
title: Unfaithful Wives 4
